problem_names: lemma norm_1_bound_mignotte: "norm1 f \<le> 2^(degree f) * mahler_measure f"

lemma sq_norm_factor_bound: 
  fixes f h :: "int poly"
  assumes dvd: "h dvd f" and f0: "f \<noteq> 0" 
  shows "\<parallel>h\<parallel>\<^sup>2 \<le> 2 ^ (2 * degree h) * \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2"
translations: lemma norm_1_bound_mignotte: "norm1 f \<le> 2^(degree f) * mahler_measure f"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. real_of_int (norm1 f) \<le> 2 ^ degree f * mahler_measure f
proof (cases "f = 0")

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. f = 0 \<Longrightarrow>
    real_of_int (norm1 f) \<le> 2 ^ degree f * mahler_measure f
 2. f \<noteq> 0 \<Longrightarrow>
    real_of_int (norm1 f) \<le> 2 ^ degree f * mahler_measure f
case f0: False

proof (state)
this:
  f \<noteq> 0

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. f = 0 \<Longrightarrow>
    real_of_int (norm1 f) \<le> 2 ^ degree f * mahler_measure f
 2. f \<noteq> 0 \<Longrightarrow>
    real_of_int (norm1 f) \<le> 2 ^ degree f * mahler_measure f
have cf: "coeffs f = map (\<lambda> i. coeff f i) [0 ..< Suc( degree f)]"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. coeffs f = map (poly.coeff f) [0..<Suc (degree f)]
unfolding coeffs_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (if f = 0 then [] else map (poly.coeff f) [0..<Suc (degree f)]) =
    map (poly.coeff f) [0..<Suc (degree f)]
using f0

proof (prove)
using this:
  f \<noteq> 0

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (if f = 0 then [] else map (poly.coeff f) [0..<Suc (degree f)]) =
    map (poly.coeff f) [0..<Suc (degree f)]
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  coeffs f = map (poly.coeff f) [0..<Suc (degree f)]

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. f = 0 \<Longrightarrow>
    real_of_int (norm1 f) \<le> 2 ^ degree f * mahler_measure f
 2. f \<noteq> 0 \<Longrightarrow>
    real_of_int (norm1 f) \<le> 2 ^ degree f * mahler_measure f

have "real_of_int (sum_list (map abs (coeffs f))) 
    = (\<Sum>i\<le>degree f. real_of_int \<bar>poly.coeff f i\<bar>)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. real_of_int (sum_list (map abs (coeffs f))) =
    (\<Sum>i\<le>degree f. real_of_int \<bar>poly.coeff f i\<bar>)
unfolding cf of_int_hom.hom_sum_list

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sum_list
     (map real_of_int (map abs (map (poly.coeff f) [0..<Suc (degree f)]))) =
    (\<Sum>i\<le>degree f. real_of_int \<bar>poly.coeff f i\<bar>)
unfolding sum_list_sum_nth

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. sum ((!) (map real_of_int
               (map abs (map (poly.coeff f) [0..<Suc (degree f)]))))
     {0..<length
           (map real_of_int
             (map abs (map (poly.coeff f) [0..<Suc (degree f)])))} =
    (\<Sum>i\<le>degree f. real_of_int \<bar>poly.coeff f i\<bar>)
by (rule sum.cong, force, auto simp: o_def nth_append)

proof (state)
this:
  real_of_int (sum_list (map abs (coeffs f))) =
  (\<Sum>i\<le>degree f. real_of_int \<bar>poly.coeff f i\<bar>)

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. f = 0 \<Longrightarrow>
    real_of_int (norm1 f) \<le> 2 ^ degree f * mahler_measure f
 2. f \<noteq> 0 \<Longrightarrow>
    real_of_int (norm1 f) \<le> 2 ^ degree f * mahler_measure f
also

proof (state)
this:
  real_of_int (sum_list (map abs (coeffs f))) =
  (\<Sum>i\<le>degree f. real_of_int \<bar>poly.coeff f i\<bar>)

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. f = 0 \<Longrightarrow>
    real_of_int (norm1 f) \<le> 2 ^ degree f * mahler_measure f
 2. f \<noteq> 0 \<Longrightarrow>
    real_of_int (norm1 f) \<le> 2 ^ degree f * mahler_measure f
have "\<dots> \<le> (\<Sum>i\<le>degree f. real (degree f choose i) * mahler_measure f)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<Sum>i\<le>degree f. real_of_int \<bar>poly.coeff f i\<bar>)
    \<le> (\<Sum>i\<le>degree f.
              real (degree f choose i) * mahler_measure f)
by (rule sum_mono, rule Mignotte_bound)

proof (state)
this:
  (\<Sum>i\<le>degree f. real_of_int \<bar>poly.coeff f i\<bar>)
  \<le> (\<Sum>i\<le>degree f. real (degree f choose i) * mahler_measure f)

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. f = 0 \<Longrightarrow>
    real_of_int (norm1 f) \<le> 2 ^ degree f * mahler_measure f
 2. f \<noteq> 0 \<Longrightarrow>
    real_of_int (norm1 f) \<le> 2 ^ degree f * mahler_measure f
also

proof (state)
this:
  (\<Sum>i\<le>degree f. real_of_int \<bar>poly.coeff f i\<bar>)
  \<le> (\<Sum>i\<le>degree f. real (degree f choose i) * mahler_measure f)

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. f = 0 \<Longrightarrow>
    real_of_int (norm1 f) \<le> 2 ^ degree f * mahler_measure f
 2. f \<noteq> 0 \<Longrightarrow>
    real_of_int (norm1 f) \<le> 2 ^ degree f * mahler_measure f
have "\<dots> = real (sum (\<lambda> i. (degree f choose i)) {..degree f}) * mahler_measure f"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<Sum>i\<le>degree f. real (degree f choose i) * mahler_measure f) =
    real (sum ((choose) (degree f)) {..degree f}) * mahler_measure f
unfolding sum_distrib_right[symmetric]

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<Sum>i\<le>degree f. real (degree f choose i)) * mahler_measure f =
    real (sum ((choose) (degree f)) {..degree f}) * mahler_measure f
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  (\<Sum>i\<le>degree f. real (degree f choose i) * mahler_measure f) =
  real (sum ((choose) (degree f)) {..degree f}) * mahler_measure f

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. f = 0 \<Longrightarrow>
    real_of_int (norm1 f) \<le> 2 ^ degree f * mahler_measure f
 2. f \<noteq> 0 \<Longrightarrow>
    real_of_int (norm1 f) \<le> 2 ^ degree f * mahler_measure f
also

proof (state)
this:
  (\<Sum>i\<le>degree f. real (degree f choose i) * mahler_measure f) =
  real (sum ((choose) (degree f)) {..degree f}) * mahler_measure f

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. f = 0 \<Longrightarrow>
    real_of_int (norm1 f) \<le> 2 ^ degree f * mahler_measure f
 2. f \<noteq> 0 \<Longrightarrow>
    real_of_int (norm1 f) \<le> 2 ^ degree f * mahler_measure f
have "\<dots> = 2^(degree f) * mahler_measure f"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. real (sum ((choose) (degree f)) {..degree f}) * mahler_measure f =
    2 ^ degree f * mahler_measure f
unfolding choose_row_sum

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. real (2 ^ degree f) * mahler_measure f = 2 ^ degree f * mahler_measure f
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  real (sum ((choose) (degree f)) {..degree f}) * mahler_measure f =
  2 ^ degree f * mahler_measure f

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. f = 0 \<Longrightarrow>
    real_of_int (norm1 f) \<le> 2 ^ degree f * mahler_measure f
 2. f \<noteq> 0 \<Longrightarrow>
    real_of_int (norm1 f) \<le> 2 ^ degree f * mahler_measure f
finally

proof (chain)
picking this:
  real_of_int (sum_list (map abs (coeffs f)))
  \<le> 2 ^ degree f * mahler_measure f
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  real_of_int (sum_list (map abs (coeffs f)))
  \<le> 2 ^ degree f * mahler_measure f

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. real_of_int (norm1 f) \<le> 2 ^ degree f * mahler_measure f
unfolding norm1_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  real_of_int (sum_list (map abs (coeffs f)))
  \<le> 2 ^ degree f * mahler_measure f

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. real_of_int (sum_list (map abs (coeffs f)))
    \<le> 2 ^ degree f * mahler_measure f

proof (state)
this:
  real_of_int (norm1 f) \<le> 2 ^ degree f * mahler_measure f

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. f = 0 \<Longrightarrow>
    real_of_int (norm1 f) \<le> 2 ^ degree f * mahler_measure f
qed (auto simp: mahler_measure_ge_0 norm1_def)
lemma mahler_measure_l2norm: "mahler_measure f \<le> sqrt (of_int \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. mahler_measure f
    \<le> sqrt (real_of_int \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2)
using Landau_inequality_mahler_measure[of f]

proof (prove)
using this:
  mahler_measure f
  \<le> sqrt (real_of_int (\<Sum>a\<leftarrow>coeffs f. a * a))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. mahler_measure f
    \<le> sqrt (real_of_int \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2)
unfolding sq_norm_poly_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  mahler_measure f
  \<le> sqrt (real_of_int (\<Sum>a\<leftarrow>coeffs f. a * a))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. mahler_measure f
    \<le> sqrt (real_of_int (sum_list (map sq_norm (coeffs f))))
by (auto simp: power2_eq_square)

lemma sq_norm_factor_bound: 
  fixes f h :: "int poly"
  assumes dvd: "h dvd f" and f0: "f \<noteq> 0" 
  shows "\<parallel>h\<parallel>\<^sup>2 \<le> 2 ^ (2 * degree h) * \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<parallel>h\<parallel>\<^sup>2
    \<le> 2 ^ (2 * degree h) * \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<parallel>h\<parallel>\<^sup>2
    \<le> 2 ^ (2 * degree h) * \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2
let ?r = real_of_int

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<parallel>h\<parallel>\<^sup>2
    \<le> 2 ^ (2 * degree h) * \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2
have h21: "?r \<parallel>h\<parallel>\<^sup>2 \<le> (?r (norm1 h))^2"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. real_of_int \<parallel>h\<parallel>\<^sup>2
    \<le> (real_of_int (norm1 h))\<^sup>2
using norm2_le_norm1_int[of h]

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<parallel>h\<parallel>\<^sup>2 \<le> (norm1 h)\<^sup>2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. real_of_int \<parallel>h\<parallel>\<^sup>2
    \<le> (real_of_int (norm1 h))\<^sup>2
by (metis of_int_le_iff of_int_power)

proof (state)
this:
  real_of_int \<parallel>h\<parallel>\<^sup>2
  \<le> (real_of_int (norm1 h))\<^sup>2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<parallel>h\<parallel>\<^sup>2
    \<le> 2 ^ (2 * degree h) * \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2
also

proof (state)
this:
  real_of_int \<parallel>h\<parallel>\<^sup>2
  \<le> (real_of_int (norm1 h))\<^sup>2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<parallel>h\<parallel>\<^sup>2
    \<le> 2 ^ (2 * degree h) * \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2
have "\<dots> \<le> (2^(degree h) * mahler_measure h)^2"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (real_of_int (norm1 h))\<^sup>2
    \<le> (2 ^ degree h * mahler_measure h)\<^sup>2
using power_mono[OF norm_1_bound_mignotte[of h], of 2]

proof (prove)
using this:
  0 \<le> real_of_int (norm1 h) \<Longrightarrow>
  (real_of_int (norm1 h))\<^sup>2
  \<le> (2 ^ degree h * mahler_measure h)\<^sup>2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (real_of_int (norm1 h))\<^sup>2
    \<le> (2 ^ degree h * mahler_measure h)\<^sup>2
by (auto simp: norm1_ge_0)

proof (state)
this:
  (real_of_int (norm1 h))\<^sup>2
  \<le> (2 ^ degree h * mahler_measure h)\<^sup>2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<parallel>h\<parallel>\<^sup>2
    \<le> 2 ^ (2 * degree h) * \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2
also

proof (state)
this:
  (real_of_int (norm1 h))\<^sup>2
  \<le> (2 ^ degree h * mahler_measure h)\<^sup>2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<parallel>h\<parallel>\<^sup>2
    \<le> 2 ^ (2 * degree h) * \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2
have "\<dots> = 2^(2 * degree h) * (mahler_measure h)^2"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (2 ^ degree h * mahler_measure h)\<^sup>2 =
    2 ^ (2 * degree h) * (mahler_measure h)\<^sup>2
by (simp add: power_even_eq power_mult_distrib)

proof (state)
this:
  (2 ^ degree h * mahler_measure h)\<^sup>2 =
  2 ^ (2 * degree h) * (mahler_measure h)\<^sup>2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<parallel>h\<parallel>\<^sup>2
    \<le> 2 ^ (2 * degree h) * \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2
also

proof (state)
this:
  (2 ^ degree h * mahler_measure h)\<^sup>2 =
  2 ^ (2 * degree h) * (mahler_measure h)\<^sup>2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<parallel>h\<parallel>\<^sup>2
    \<le> 2 ^ (2 * degree h) * \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2
have "\<dots> \<le> 2^(2 * degree h) * (mahler_measure f)^2"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. 2 ^ (2 * degree h) * (mahler_measure h)\<^sup>2
    \<le> 2 ^ (2 * degree h) * (mahler_measure f)\<^sup>2

by (rule mult_left_mono[OF power_mono], auto simp: mahler_measure_ge_0
    mahler_measure_dvd[OF f0 dvd])

proof (state)
this:
  2 ^ (2 * degree h) * (mahler_measure h)\<^sup>2
  \<le> 2 ^ (2 * degree h) * (mahler_measure f)\<^sup>2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<parallel>h\<parallel>\<^sup>2
    \<le> 2 ^ (2 * degree h) * \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2
also

proof (state)
this:
  2 ^ (2 * degree h) * (mahler_measure h)\<^sup>2
  \<le> 2 ^ (2 * degree h) * (mahler_measure f)\<^sup>2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<parallel>h\<parallel>\<^sup>2
    \<le> 2 ^ (2 * degree h) * \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2
have "\<dots> \<le> 2^(2 * degree h) * ?r (\<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. 2 ^ (2 * degree h) * (mahler_measure f)\<^sup>2
    \<le> 2 ^ (2 * degree h) * real_of_int \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2
proof (rule mult_left_mono)

proof (state)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. (mahler_measure f)\<^sup>2
    \<le> real_of_int \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2
 2. 0 \<le> 2 ^ (2 * degree h)
have "?r (\<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2) \<ge> 0"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. 0 \<le> real_of_int \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  0 \<le> real_of_int \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. (mahler_measure f)\<^sup>2
    \<le> real_of_int \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2
 2. 0 \<le> 2 ^ (2 * degree h)
from real_sqrt_pow2[OF this]

proof (chain)
picking this:
  (sqrt (real_of_int \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2))\<^sup>2 =
  real_of_int \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2
show "(mahler_measure f)\<^sup>2 \<le> ?r (\<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  (sqrt (real_of_int \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2))\<^sup>2 =
  real_of_int \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (mahler_measure f)\<^sup>2
    \<le> real_of_int \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2
using power_mono[OF mahler_measure_l2norm[of f], of 2]

proof (prove)
using this:
  (sqrt (real_of_int \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2))\<^sup>2 =
  real_of_int \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2
  0 \<le> mahler_measure f \<Longrightarrow>
  (mahler_measure f)\<^sup>2
  \<le> (sqrt (real_of_int \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2))\<^sup>2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (mahler_measure f)\<^sup>2
    \<le> real_of_int \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2
by (auto simp: mahler_measure_ge_0)

proof (state)
this:
  (mahler_measure f)\<^sup>2
  \<le> real_of_int \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. 0 \<le> 2 ^ (2 * degree h)
qed auto

proof (state)
this:
  2 ^ (2 * degree h) * (mahler_measure f)\<^sup>2
  \<le> 2 ^ (2 * degree h) * real_of_int \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<parallel>h\<parallel>\<^sup>2
    \<le> 2 ^ (2 * degree h) * \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2
also

proof (state)
this:
  2 ^ (2 * degree h) * (mahler_measure f)\<^sup>2
  \<le> 2 ^ (2 * degree h) * real_of_int \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<parallel>h\<parallel>\<^sup>2
    \<le> 2 ^ (2 * degree h) * \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2
have "\<dots> = ?r (2^(2*degree h) * \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. 2 ^ (2 * degree h) * real_of_int \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2 =
    real_of_int (2 ^ (2 * degree h) * \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2)
by (simp add: ac_simps)

proof (state)
this:
  2 ^ (2 * degree h) * real_of_int \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2 =
  real_of_int (2 ^ (2 * degree h) * \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<parallel>h\<parallel>\<^sup>2
    \<le> 2 ^ (2 * degree h) * \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2
finally

proof (chain)
picking this:
  real_of_int \<parallel>h\<parallel>\<^sup>2
  \<le> real_of_int (2 ^ (2 * degree h) * \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2)
show "\<parallel>h\<parallel>\<^sup>2 \<le> 2 ^ (2 * degree h) * \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2"

proof (prove)
using this:
  real_of_int \<parallel>h\<parallel>\<^sup>2
  \<le> real_of_int (2 ^ (2 * degree h) * \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<parallel>h\<parallel>\<^sup>2
    \<le> 2 ^ (2 * degree h) * \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2
unfolding of_int_le_iff

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<parallel>h\<parallel>\<^sup>2
  \<le> 2 ^ (2 * degree h) * \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<parallel>h\<parallel>\<^sup>2
    \<le> 2 ^ (2 * degree h) * \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2

proof (state)
this:
  \<parallel>h\<parallel>\<^sup>2
  \<le> 2 ^ (2 * degree h) * \<parallel>f\<parallel>\<^sup>2

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
end
